comment.body: I think you can delete  it. But maybe not with my comment.  You should try to delete it. :)

They say a picture is worth a thousand words. And your picture is accurate with respect to the difference between Bitcoin and Fiat currency. 

Even a hundred thousand words wouldn't begin to explain the enormous importance and potential of Bitcoin.

As with any financial instrument, **due diligence** is required. Especially with Bitcoin..👍😀
Someone needs to add **Retroshare** as an app in the Android **Userland** app..👍😀
@nofish: I think you could also add **Zeronet** as a **Userland** app too..😃
